techmeme.title: Trump says "Apple should get rid of DEI rules, not just make adjustments to them" in a Truth Social post, after Apple investors rejected a proposal to end DEI (Hadriana Lowenkron/Bloomberg)
YouTube says it now has 1B+ monthly viewers for podcast content worldwide; users watched 400M+ hours of podcasts monthly on living room devices in 2024 (Todd Spangler/Variety)
DeepSeek cuts API prices in off-peak times, between 00:30 and 08:30 in Beijing, by 75% for R1 and 50% for V3; the times are during US and Europe daylight hours (Eduardo Baptista/Reuters)
Estonia partners with OpenAI and Anthropic to launch an AI skills drive in schools for 20,000 students aged 16 and 17, aiming to help develop critical thinking (Financial Times)
Bridgetown Research, which aims to use AI agents to expedite data collection and research in due diligence, raised a $19M Series A led by Accel and Lightspeed (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
